mapper.select: select count(*) from t_shop where shop_id=#{shopId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_shop ( shop_id, shop_name, provence_id, city_id, region_id, phone, address, user_id, invite_code, shop_account, license, version) values (#{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{provenceId}, #{cityId}, #{regionId}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userId}, #{inviteCode}, #{shopAccount}, #{license}, 0 )
